title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.187 - Medicare
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.187 - Medicare

State Regulations
A third-party reimbursement program administered by the

Social Security Administration that underwrites the medical costs of persons 65
and over and some qualified persons under 65. "Part A" covers hospital services
and "part B" covers physicians' services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.187

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
